interpretation: Moderate vocal confidence - generally clear speech with occasional hesitation or pauses
recommendations: Consider reducing frequent pausing - 58.7% of speech time is pauses. Aim for 20-40% pause time.
Try to reduce some long pauses - 6 pause(s) longer than 1 second detected. A few long pauses are fine, but many can reduce flow.
You could improve speech fluency slightly - practice speaking more smoothly between thoughts
